FuncDef: This command configures a single system-wide alternate source IPv4 address of the GRE tunnels in all VPRN services using theauto-bind-tunnelor an explicit SDP binding (config>service>vprn>spoke-sdp) with a tunnel of encapsulation GRE.
ExtraInfo: Default: vpn-gre-source-ip ip-address (System interface primary IPv4 address)
